projects.project_name: Ty Poa and Nimit Laterite Road Project

ProjectSummary.Name: Ty Poa and Nimit Laterite Road Project
ProjectSummary.Objective: At the end of 2009 we will have a good road for using

Outputs_Estimated_Cost.Description: Laterite road New [ 1010102 ]Dimension #1 : 4.500 Width (m)Dimension #2 : 2,932.000 Volume of earth (m3)

Evironmental_Safeguard.Impact: This project required environment study.Under environmental watchlist.
Evironmental_Safeguard.Reason: This project is to rehabilitate the laterite road system and did not impact to the environment. So it is no need to submit the supporting document to the provincial department of environment.
Evironmental_Safeguard.Submissiondate: 11-Feb-2009 (Date Environmental Analysis Report and Environmental Management Plan sent to Safeguard Working Group (SWG) of NCDDs)

Land_Safeguard.Impact: This project did not require land acquisition report.Public

Highland_Safeguard.Impact: This project did not require highland people report.
